translations: 最愚蠢的（stupid 的最高级）

sentences.sentence: Huck, it's the stupidest arrangement I ever see.
sentences.translation: 哈克，这是我见过的最愚蠢的安排。

sentences.sentence: It's the stupidest tea-party I ever was at in all my life!
sentences.translation: 这是我一生中参加过的最愚蠢的茶会！

sentences.sentence: The stupidest questions of all were asked by Mollie, the white mare.
sentences.translation: 最愚蠢的问题是白母马莫丽问的。
